settings.home_textwithcta_content: "C4 has been my go-to energy drink for the past 5 years. It's an essential part of my morning gym routine and powers me through my daily hustle." - Kevin Hart

settings.home_product_intro_title: Designed to support your day mentally and physically
settings.home_product_intro_smart_energy_content:
C4 Smart Energy sharpens your attention, boosting memory and performance.

C4 Smart Energy features patented, clinically studied Cognizin® and naturally-derived caffeine from green tea to deliver the mental focus you crave.
settings.home_product_intro_smart_energy_item3_su: ZERO CALORIES, ZERO CARBS, & NO ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS OR DYES
settings.home_product_intro_c4_energy_content:
C4 Energy promotes endurance, hydration and heightened physical performance.

Every can contains the patented, clinically studied CarnoSyn®, which can help to fight fatigue and improve muscular endurance.

settings.home_success_quote: Made with high-quality ingredients you can trust, C4 keeps you sharp physically and mentally. It’s why I recommend it to all my clients, and I always grab a can whenever I need brain fuel, body fuel or both!

settings.home_servings_content: For over a decade C4 has defined performance energy with over 3 billion servings sold globally.<sup>*</sup>
settings.home_servings_footnote: <sup>*</sup>Based on the number of servings of all C4<sup>®</sup> branded products sold globally from 2014 to the present.

settings.hero_intro_text: Today, more than ever, any advantage should be your advantage. The science behind our C4 Energy and C4 Smart Energy gives you the daily edge to crush every obstacle and be ready for whatever comes next.

settings.item_content:
INNOVATEA® Delivers the clean energy of naturally derived caffeine.

C4 Smart Energy also includes Innovatea®, naturally derived caffeine from Green Tea, free from pesticides, and Non-GMO project verified.

Take Citicoline. It’s a naturally occurring nutrient in our brains, and it helps our neurotransmitters send signals across billions of synapses. When we are depleted of Citicoline, neurotransmission may suffers.

Cognizin® is a proprietary form of Citicoline, and the subject of numerous clinical studies, setting it apart from many other Citicoline ingredients

A clinically-studied ingredient, Cognizin boosts helps increase levels of phosphatidylcholine, an important phospholipid that helps protect brain membranes, and strengthen cell structure, maximizing enhance neurotransmitter output, and it supports healthy mitochondria, the cellular engines powering the brain.1

THE C4 SMART ENERGY BENEFIT IS GREATER MENTAL ENERGY, FOCUS AND ATTENTION.

N-Acetyl-L-Tyrosine is a more soluble form of L-Tyrosine, which supports the production of noradrenaline and dopamine, in turn supporting mental and cognitive health during stressful activities – such as physical training.
Free of artificial colors and flavors, C4 Smart Energy comes in a wide range of dynamic flavors including Cotton Candy, Electric Sour, Freedom Ice, and Peach Mango Nectar.

200mg of Caffeine Anhydrous delivers key pre-workout benefits.

From boosting the metabolism and promoting fat burning, it increases endurance, improves circulation, pain reduction and preserves muscles.

Naturally-derived from beets, BetaPower Betaine helps to support hydration and better physical performance.

  • An increase of 30% in squat repetitions after a 7-day betaine intake.3
  • An increase of 60% after a 14-day betaine intake.3
  • A significant increase in the quality of repetitions performed (at reps performed at 90% of the subjects’ maximal performance) after 7-day and 14-day betaine intake.3

BetaPower Betaine delivers C4 Energy the power of beets—call it our super food.

Take CarnoSyn®. A clinically-studied form of Beta-Alanine, an amino acid found within our skeletal muscle tissue. CarnoSyn® is backed up by 55 studies that support its effectiveness in INCREASING MUSCULAR ENDURANCE, SUSTAINING PEAK POWER OUTPUT DURING ANAEROBIC TRAINING, AND REDUCING PERCEPTION OF FATIGUE*

  • Cyclists saw a boost of 11.4% above baseline, in improved muscle endurance but while fatigued at the end of a time trial, compared to placebo, after 8 weeks of usage.2
  • High-intensity interval training athletes increased their muscular endurance and better lean body mass in 6 week trial.2

Only C4 Energy features CarnoSyn®.

N-Acetyl-L-Tyrosine is a more soluble form of L-Tyrosine, which supports the production of noradrenaline and dopamine, in turn supporting mental and cognitive health during stressful activities – such as physical training.

Citrulline is an amino acid that occurs naturally in the body. Increasing your intake may have beneficial effects on exercise performance as Citrulline increases blood flow by increasing nitric oxide production. Citrulline may also produce positive effects on muscle by stimulating protein synthesis and decreasing amino acid breakdown during workouts.

settings.left_column_description: C4 Smart Energy sharpens your attention, boosting memory and performance.
settings.left_column_footnote: 1. Improved Attentional Performance Following Citicoline Administration in Healthy Adult Women Erin McGlade1,2, Allison Locatelli1 , Julia Hardy1 , Toshikazu Kamiya3 , Masahiko Morita4 , Koji Morishita4 , Yoichiro Sugimura4 , Deborah Yurgelun-Todd1,2 1 Brain Institute, University of Utah, Salt Lake City, USA; Department of Psychiatry, University of Utah, Salt Lake City, USA; 3 Kyowa Hakko USA, Inc., New York, USA; 4 Kyowa Hakko Bio Co., Ltd., Tokyo, Japan. Email: erin.mcglade@hsc.utah.edu Received February 23rd, 2012; revises April 16th, 2012; accepted April 23rd, 2012, Read More
settings.right_column_description: C4 Energy promotes endurance, hydration and heightened physical performance.
settings.right_column_footnote:
2. Van Thienen R, et al., 2009. Beta-alanine improves sprint performance in endurance cycling. Med. Sci. Sports Exerc. 41: 898–903 Baguet A, et al., 2010. Important role of muscle carnosine in rowing performance. J Appl Physiol, 109: 1096−1101. Smith AE, et al. Effects of beta-alanine supplementation and high-intensity interval training on endurance performance and body composition in men; a double-blind trial. J Int Soc Sports Nutr. 2009;6: 5.
3. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2651845/
*Studies have shown performance benefits of beta-alanine to be correlated with muscle carnosine concentrations, which increase with cumulative use.

settings.review_text: The taste and effects are way better than other energy drinks out there.
I get a very clean, focused energy after drinking this. No jitters, no crash.
These outperform other products and actually give me a pick-me-up.
Tasty, revitalizing, and somehow someway there are zero calories and sugar.
This has saved me on days where I need to turn it up to an 11.
If it's for life or for the gym, this is a great pick me up!
Serves as a mental cue that it's time to get to work.
I use this to focus and get past my slump at work – it has made a huge difference.
Man... the freedom ice is my absolute FAVORITE beverage of all time.
What's more to need? Physical energy; mental energy. Such a great all-around beverage!

settings.faq_question: Can i cancel my subscription anytime?
settings.faq_answer: Yes, you can cancel, pause, change flavors, or increase the number of cans in your subscription at any time. Our website is open 24/7.

settings.faq_question: Do I have to subscribe to monthly delivery?
settings.faq_answer: Our default delivery setting is every 4 weeks, but you can easily change your delivery interval to 2, 4, 6, or even 8 weeks within your account. You can also increase your quantity if you want more C4.

settings.faq_question: Can I speak with a live representative?
settings.faq_answer:
Of course! Call us directly at (866) 927-9686. If you prefer to connect digitally, you can email
support@c4energy.com or use our Live Chat feature on C4energy.com.

settings.faq_question: What if I am not happy with my trial 24 cans?
settings.faq_answer: No problem, we’ll give you a complete refund! We promise a full 100% money back guarantee if you don’t love C4. That’s how much we believe in our product.

settings.faq_question: What makes C4 such a great energy drink?
settings.faq_answer: C4 Energy and Smart Energy is made with zero sugar, zero calories, and zero carbohydrates. It's also free from artificial colors or dyes. In addition, C4 contains a combination of clinically studied functional ingredients like CarnoSyn® Beta-Alanine, BetaPower® Betaine, caffeine, and citrulline to help you dominate life.

settings.faq_question: WHAT MAKES C4 SUCH A GREAT ENERGY DRINK?
settings.faq_answer: C4 Smart Energy is made with zero sugar, zero calories, and zero carbohydrates. It's also free from artificial colors or dyes. In addition, C4 contains a combination of clinically studied functional ingredients like InnovaTea® Naturally Derived Caffeine, Cognizin® Citicoline, and N-Acetyl L-Tyrosine to help you dominate gaming.

settings.review_text: I USE THIS TO FOCUS AND GET PAST MY SLUMP AT WORK — IT HAS MADE A HUGE DIFFERENCE
THESE OUTPERFORM OTHER PRODUCTS AND ACTUALLY GIVE ME A PICK-ME-UP.
WHAT'S MORE TO NEED? PHYSICAL ENERGY; MENTAL ENERGY. SUCH A GREAT ALL-AROUND BEVERAGE!
